properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 12:11PM EST until February 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...

Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Greenup and Scioto Counties.

...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...West Virginia...

Ohio River At Huntington affecting Wayne, Cabell, Boyd and
Lawrence Counties.

Ohio River At Ashland affecting Greenup, Boyd and Lawrence
Counties.

For the Ohio River...Moderate flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River At Greenup Lock.
* Until Sunday morning.
* At 11:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 54.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 54.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending
at 11:45 AM EST Friday was 54.7 feet.
* Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a
maximum value of 55.2 feet just after midnight tonight.
* Impact...At 56.0 feet, Several low lying areas flooded and
backwater affected on both sides of the river.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 55.3
feet on 01/22/1996.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive
cars through flooded areas.

Please report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. You may
also report severe weather by posting your report to the Charleston
West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or by using
the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.

This warning will be in effect until the river falls below its flood
stage.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning is now in effect until Sunday morning
